body.name: d’Alba Italian White Truffle First Aromatic Toner, Vegan Skincare, Gentle Hydrating Toner with White Truffles, Weakly Acidic Toner, Skin Texture Enhancement, Surfactant Free
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 20 hrs 14 mins
features: Premium White Truffles carefully extracted from Piedmont, Italy, infused with Tocopherol(vitamin E) make d'Alba's signature ingredient Trufferol, which is rich in antioxidants.
Certified Vegan after meticulous testing by Italian V-label, the trustworthy vegan formula is also hypoallergenic, mild for sensitive skin safely sealed with the approval of Dermatest.
Weakly acidic with a pH level of 4.0-6.0 (the neutral skin state), it brightens and smooths by sealing in moisture and creating a barrier to prevent bacteria while gently helping cell turnover.
Non-skin irritating exfoliating agents: phyto enzyme complex and PHA (gluconolactone) to gently prep the skin for a clean and bright complexion.
Rosa Damascena Flower Water soothes the skin, and the Green Tea Leaf extract contains pore-tightening properties. Shake the SERUM & WATER layer well before use.
body.description: White Truffle First Aromatic Toner Serum in a toner If you feel dehydrated no matter what you apply, how about putting a serum in the first step of your skincare routine? Double up the hydration with the serum water and oil formula. Fill with hydration and lock it in. You'll get hydrated and prepped up skin for the next step. Weakly Acidic dermatested toner Keep your skin pH level at its neutral state which is a pH of 4.0-6.0. Not irritating the skin while having mild exfoliant agents such as phyto enzyme complex and PHA, for smooth and clear skin. Dermatested for safe use. Double Layer Formula Not having any surfactants, the VEGAN toner is layered into two formulas. White truffle extract with tocopherol and soothing ingredients such as rosa damascena flower water in the bottom layer, dalba-8 (plant-based) blending oil consisting of avocado oil, olive oil, etc. in the top layer giving the skin double nourishment.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: White Truffle First Aromatic Toner Serum in a toner If you feel dehydrated no matter what you apply, how about putting a serum in the first step of your skincare routine? Double up the hydration with the serum water and oil formula. Fill with hydration and lock it in. You'll get hydrated and prepped up skin for the next step. Weakly Acidic dermatested toner Keep your skin pH level at its neutral state which is a pH of 4.0-6.0. Not irritating the skin while having mild exfoliant agents such as phyto enzyme complex and PHA, for smooth and clear skin. Dermatested for safe use. Double Layer Formula Not having any surfactants, the VEGAN toner is layered into two formulas. White truffle extract with tocopherol and soothing ingredients such as rosa damascena flower water in the bottom layer, dalba-8 (plant-based) blending oil consisting of avocado oil, olive oil, etc. in the top layer giving the skin double nourishment. Recommended to... all skin types including sensitive skin those who are looking for weakly acidic skincare those who want double hydration those who need skin texture enhancement

Benefits The toner preps up the skin for the next step with a mild and vegan formula. While keeping the skin in a neutral state, it gently exfoliates the skin also hydrating for plump skin. Texture The light watery texture gets absorbed into your skin easily also locking in moisture for it to last. Leaves your skin smooth and supple. Application After cleansing, shake the product 3-5 times for the formula to mix well. Apply on face and pat to absorb. TIP For extra dehydrated skin, apply a couple of times to add more hydration. Or, dab it on a cotton pad and lay it on dry patches of the skin.

Mild Skin Balancing Vegan Toner White Truffle First Aromatic Toner Benefits Mild pH (4.6~5.6 ): Formulated close to natural skin's pH to balance skin while providing gentle hydration. Weakly Acidic pH (4.0~6.0): Brightens and locks in moisture while gently helping cell turnover. Main ingredients White Truffle, Centella Asiatica Extract, Vegan Ceramide White Truffle, Rose Water, Green Tea Leaf Extract Texture A watery texture, the toner provides gentle hydration with lightweight finish. Surfactant-free the double serum and water formula layer effectively hydrates and moisturizes the skin. How to use Apply the toner on a cotton pad and gently wipe it across your skin, after cleansing. Shake the SERUM & WATER layer well before use. Apply on face and pat to absorb. Size 5.07 fl.oz 5.24 fl.oz

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased spray bottle, this time I ordered toner as well all my friends and family asked me what I did to my face, they all said " your face very vibrant and healthy looking. Very pleased and sun screen I purchased is light and it's not sticky like other sunscreen product. Recommend to anyone who have sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE EVERYTHING FROM THIS COMPANY!
reviews.reviewText: Smells delish. Feels clean. One of my favorites. Period. I am toner addicted. I have already reordered this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: d'Alba Italian White Truffle First Aromatic Toner smells wonderful and makes my dry, sensitive skin feel hydrated and comfortable. I put some in the palm of my hand and then gently massage all over my face and neck. I hate to waste any product on a cotton round given the premium price! I use it as part of my night routine and apply before my night cream. I believe it has improved my skin texture and moisture level.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I am a huge fan of d'Alba Piedmont. I love most of their products I've tried, and I probably have about 12 or 13 of those in my bathroom closet right now. They produce high quality, affordable skincare products that are such a pleasure to use, and this product is no different. This one is a little tricky, though. Some of the product information says that it is a serum and water in one bottle. That's true, and the bottle must be shaken before using to mix the oily ingredients with the water-based ones. But instead of using it as you would use a serum, this is intended to be used as a toner, so it goes on your skin directly after cleansing. In Korean skincare, toners and essences follow cleansing, and they are meant to help prepare your skin for the treatments that come next (usually serums). I apply this stuff by pouring a little bit into my palm and kind of patting it into my skin. I like to use a few layers of this toner before moving on to the next step in my skincare routine. I find the pop-top dispenser a little bit annoying to use, but it would minimize waste if the bottle should get knocked over. The fragrance of this product is very light and pleasant, and it does seem to hydrate my thirsty skin pretty well. My skin is fairly sensitive, but I haven't noticed any reaction or irritation after using this toner.I am definitely enjoying the hydration this toner provides, but my favorite thing about it is that it is 100% cruelty-free! All d'Alba products are, so you don't have to worry about your purchase supporting any ugly animal testing. And guess what? A clean conscience leads to fewer wrinkles! It's a win for everybody!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great and I love the scent
reviews.reviewText: This is a great toner, it feels very luxurious. I love the way it smells and my skin feels great after using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding for all skin types, even my very sensitive skin - Smells awesome
reviews.reviewText: I HAVE SUFFERED FROM SKIN CANCER – OUR FAMILY HAS ALL DIFFERENT SKIN CARE NEEDSI am going to start by telling you that I am a middle aged man who is now paying the price for neglecting his skin in his youth. I have had a couple bouts with skin cancer. Just yesterday, I had to visit my dermatologist to deal with more facial skin issues. My daughter is a young adult who struggles with the skin issues that most her age tend to face. My wife, of course, is timeless. She has issues with oily skin.WE ARE EXISTING CUSTOMERS – I HAVE SENSITIVE SKIN – CAN’T USE PRODUCTS WITH ALCOHOLThe point is, our entire family has been using D’Alba products for quite some time for all different reasons. My wife, daughter and dermatologist have strongly urged me to take better care of my skin, and toner is now part of it. So, I was very curious about this toner because it is made by D’Alba and it does not contain alcohol (I have very sensitive skin and can’t use anything with alcohol).OUTSTANDING PRODUCT – SMELLS GOOD – BETTER THAN WHAT I ALREADY USE IN SAME PRICE RANGETo put it succinctly: This product is AMAZING! It does not irritate my skin at all. **(I recommend testing on a small area of your skin if you are concerned about sensitivity.)** The product I use now is in the same price range and it also does not contain alcohol. However, the D’Alba toner blows it out of the water. I have tried many products, but this one truly delivers. An added plus is that it also smells nice.KOREAN SKIN CARE PRODUCTS TEND TO EXCELAs a side note: Our family has found that Korean skin care products are pretty tough to beat in terms of effectiveness and quality. This product is no different.FINAL THOUGHTSNo exaggeration, this toner is amazing. I will be a permanent customer of this product. Period.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Worst packaging ever!!!
reviews.reviewText: I like to enjoy their product but this toner package was the worst of others. Toner licked out everywhere in my bag when I tried to tighten and close it well it never worked. I bought this and after three days it was gone because it spilled all over place. I even sent DM to their instagram to communicate and they never reply back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Conditioning Toner
reviews.reviewText: This is quite a nice conditioning toner for the face. You will need to shake it up before using because some of the properties have a tendency to separate. Easy enough. Pour a little in the palm of your hand and splash along the face or you can pour some into a swab or makeup removal pad to blot along the skin.Feels quite soothing while applying. Very refreshing and conditioning to the skin. There is a scent to this that is a little bit more floral than it is citrus, but it's very pleasant and somewhat on the mild side. Those who are scent adverse might not like this, but the rest of us will most likely enjoy the scent. I know that I do.It's very clean and does not cause me any sort of irritation at all. Though it's lightweight, it will provide you with some extra moisturization. On those hot and balmy days, this is good to use when you don't want to load up your skin with other heavier skincare products. You'll get your toning and clarifying, as well as a good bit of moisturization. Once it sets, it does not leave the skin feeling oily or greasy.Good for all skin types and is just as good for men as it is for women.
Silky hydration that absorbs well, can be used in layers. Love this product as a first step after cleansing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is very expensive for the same result of other products
Dried my skin up too much and caused black blemishes around my mouth (I don't have sensitive skin)
